SELECT alarmInfoB.* FROM (SELECT rownum as countnum, alarmInfoA.* FROM (SELECT rownum as rn, alarm_seq, emp_id, alarm_sender, alarm_cont, alarm_link_cont, alarm_st, alarm_dt FROM ALARM WHERE EMP_ID = #{empId} AND ALARM_ST = 'Y' AND alarm_cont NOT LIKE 'chat' || '%' ORDER BY alarm_dt desc ) alarmInfoA ) alarmInfoB WHERE alarmInfoB.countnum <= 5
SELECT alarm_seq, emp_id, alarm_sender, alarm_cont, alarm_link_cont, alarm_st, alarm_dt FROM ALARM WHERE EMP_ID = #{empId} AND alarm_cont LIKE 'chat' || '%' AND ALARM_ST = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO alarm (alarm_seq, emp_id, alarm_sender, alarm_cont, alarm_st, alarm_dt, alarm_link_cont) VALUES (ALARM_SEQ.nextval, #{empId}, #{alarmSender}, #{alarmCont}, 'Y', SYSDATE, #{alarmLinkCont})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM alarm WHERE emp_id = #{empId} AND alarm_st = 'Y' AND alarm_cont NOT LIKE 'chat' || '%'
